Name: boric acid production, anhydrous, powder | boric acid, anhydrous, powder | EN15804GD, U
Category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/089:Mining and quarrying n.e.c./0891:Mining of chemical and fertilizer minerals
Description: This dataset models the production of boric acid from colemanite minerals (calcium borates) with the aid of sulfuric acid, with process yield of 95%. As by-product, gypsum (CaSO4) is produced.;The production of boric acid can be summarized with the following reaction equation:;(2CaO.3B2O3.5H2O) + 2 H2SO4 â†’ 3 (B2O3.3H2O) + 2 CaSO4
